verses.verse: And I saw <S%G3708><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> the Lamb <S%G721><s%> broke <S%G455><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the seven <S%G2033><s%> seals, <S%G4973><s%> and I heard <S%G191><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the four <S%G5064><s%> living <S%G2226><s%> creatures <S%G2226><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> as with a voice <S%G5456><s%> of thunder, <S%G1027><s%> "Come. <S%G2064><s%>"

And I looked, <S%G3708><s%> and behold, <S%G2400><s%> a white <S%G3022><s%> horse, <S%G2462><s%> and he who sat <S%G2521><s%> on it had <S%G2192><s%> a bow; <S%G5115><s%> and a crown <S%G4735><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> to him; and he went <S%G1831><s%> out conquering, <S%G3528><s%> and to conquer. <S%G3528><s%>

And when <S%G3753><s%> He broke <S%G455><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> seal, <S%G4973><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> living <S%G2226><s%> creature <S%G2226><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Come. <S%G2064><s%>"

And another, <S%G243><s%> a red <S%G4450><s%> horse, <S%G2462><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out; and to him who sat <S%G2521><s%> on it, it was granted <S%G1325><s%> to take <S%G2983><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> from the earth, <S%G1093><s%> and that [men] should slay <S%G4969><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another; <S%G240><s%> and a great <S%G3173><s%> sword <S%G3162><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> to him.

And when <S%G3753><s%> He broke <S%G455><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> seal, <S%G4973><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> living <S%G2226><s%> creature <S%G2226><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Come. <S%G2064><s%>" And I looked, <S%G3708><s%> and behold, <S%G2400><s%> a black <S%G3189><s%> horse; <S%G2462><s%> and he who sat <S%G2521><s%> on it had <S%G2192><s%> a pair <S%G2218><s%> of scales <S%G2218><s%> in his hand. <S%G5495><s%>

And I heard <S%G191><s%> as it were a voice <S%G5456><s%> in the center <S%G3319><s%> of the four <S%G5064><s%> living <S%G2226><s%> creatures <S%G2226><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "A quart <S%G5518><s%> of wheat <S%G4621><s%> for a denarius, <S%G1220><s%> and three <S%G5140><s%> quarts <S%G5518><s%> of barley <S%G2915><s%> for a denarius; <S%G1220><s%> and do not harm <S%G91><s%> the oil <S%G1637><s%> and the wine. <S%G3631><s%>"

And when <S%G3753><s%> He broke <S%G455><s%> the fourth <S%G5067><s%> seal, <S%G4973><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> of the fourth <S%G5067><s%> living <S%G2226><s%> creature <S%G2226><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Come. <S%G2064><s%>"

And I looked, <S%G3708><s%> and behold, <S%G2400><s%> an ashen <S%G5515><s%> horse; <S%G2462><s%> and he who sat <S%G2521><s%> on it had the name <S%G3686><s%> Death; <S%G2288><s%> and Hades <S%G86><s%> was following <S%G190><s%> with him. And authority <S%G1849><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> to them over <S%G1909><s%> a fourth <S%G5067><s%> of the earth, <S%G1093><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> with sword <S%G4501><s%> and with famine <S%G3042><s%> and with pestilence <S%G2288><s%> and by the wild <S%G2342><s%> beasts <S%G2342><s%> of the earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And when <S%G3753><s%> He broke <S%G455><s%> the fifth <S%G3991><s%> seal, <S%G4973><s%> I saw <S%G3708><s%> underneath <S%G5270><s%> the altar <S%G2379><s%> the souls <S%G5590><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> who had been slain <S%G4969><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the word <S%G3056><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and because <S%G1223><s%> of the testimony <S%G3141><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they had maintained; <S%G2192><s%>

and they cried <S%G2896><s%> out with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "How <S%G2193><s%> long, <S%G2193><s%> <S%G4219><s%> O Lord, <S%G1203><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> and true, <S%G228><s%> wilt Thou refrain <S%G3756><s%> from judging <S%G2919><s%> and avenging <S%G1556><s%> our blood <S%G129><s%> on those <S%G3588><s%> who dwell <S%G2730><s%> on the earth <S%G1093><s%>?"

And there was given <S%G1325><s%> to each <S%G1538><s%> of them a white <S%G3022><s%> robe; <S%G4749><s%> and they were told <S%G3004><s%> that they should rest <S%G373><s%> for a little <S%G3398><s%> while <S%G5550><s%> longer, <S%G2089><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> [the number of] their fellow <S%G4889><s%> servants <S%G4889><s%> and their brethren <S%G80><s%> who were to be killed <S%G615><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> as they had been, should be completed <S%G4137><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

And I looked <S%G3708><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> He broke <S%G455><s%> the sixth <S%G1623><s%> seal, <S%G4973><s%> and there was a great <S%G3173><s%> earthquake; <S%G4578><s%> and the sun <S%G2246><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> black <S%G3189><s%> as sackcloth <S%G4526><s%> [made] of hair, <S%G5155><s%> and the whole <S%G3650><s%> moon <S%G4582><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> blood; <S%G129><s%>

and the stars <S%G792><s%> of the sky <S%G3772><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> to the earth, <S%G1093><s%> as a fig <S%G4808><s%> tree <S%G4808><s%> casts <S%G906><s%> its unripe <S%G3653><s%> figs <S%G3653><s%> when shaken <S%G4579><s%> by a great <S%G3173><s%> wind. <S%G417><s%>

And the sky <S%G3772><s%> was split <S%G673><s%> apart <S%G673><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> a scroll <S%G975><s%> when it is rolled <S%G1667><s%> up; and every <S%G3956><s%> mountain <S%G3735><s%> and island <S%G3520><s%> were moved <S%G2795><s%> out of their places. <S%G5117><s%>

And the kings <S%G935><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> and the great <S%G3175><s%> men <S%G3175><s%> and the commanders <S%G5506><s%> and the rich <S%G4145><s%> and the strong <S%G2478><s%> and every <S%G3956><s%> slave <S%G1401><s%> and free <S%G1658><s%> man, <S%G1658><s%> hid <S%G2928><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> in the caves <S%G4693><s%> and among <S%G1519><s%> the rocks <S%G4073><s%> of the mountains; <S%G3735><s%>

and they said <S%G3004><s%> to the mountains <S%G3735><s%> and to the rocks, <S%G4073><s%> "Fall <S%G4098><s%> on us and hide <S%G2928><s%> us from the presence <S%G4383><s%> of Him who sits <S%G2521><s%> on the throne, <S%G2362><s%> and from the wrath <S%G3709><s%> of the Lamb; <S%G721><s%>
for the great <S%G3173><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> of their wrath <S%G3709><s%> has come; <S%G2064><s%> and who <S%G5101><s%> is able <S%G1410><s%> to stand <S%G2476><s%>? "
